alert.note: Alert for Santa Barbara County Southeastern Coast; Santa Ynez Mountains Eastern Range (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued May 29 at 8:56PM PDT until May 30 at 9:00AM PDT by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM PDT MONDAY... * WHAT...North winds 20 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...Santa Barbara County Southeastern Coast and Santa Ynez Mountains Eastern Range. Strongest near Montecito Hills. * WHEN...Until 9 AM PDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will make driving difficult and could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Santa Barbara County Southeastern Coast; Santa Ynez Mountains Eastern Range
